summary:
Naked Spell
Undress the target. When time runs out, the actor auto equip.
descriptionHtml:
Description:
Undressing Spells. When time runs out, the actor auto equip.

Note: The Images are for older version.

V2.0:

3 Spells with effects and equal too 3 without visual shader effects(NFx).
1 Funny Wave Spell.

All spells are in Illusion tab.
All spells are auto lerning. Don\'t need buy or use console. (Plug & Play)

Spells Descriptions:
N-Beam: A beam. Undress the target. If you concentrate. Only affect female
N-Beam NFx: Same that N-Beam but without visual shader effect.
N-Explo: A Explosion. Undress all actor in area(50) for 15s.
N-Explo NFx: Same that N-Explo but without visual shader effect.
N-Shot Unisex: Undress any target for 8s.
N-Shot Unisex NFx: Same that N-Shot Unisex but without visual shader effect.
N-Shot Female: Same that N-Shot Unisex but only undress female targets.
N-Shot Female NFx: Same that N-Shot Female but without visual shader effect.
N-Wave: Cast a Red Wave. Undressing all in the way of the wave.

V2.0.1:
Added the descriptios to the game.


Extra Info:
spell-ids:
xx000D62 N-Shot Unisex
xx000D63 N-Shot Unisex NFx
xx000D66 N-Shot Female
xx000D68 N-Shot Female NFx
xx000D6A N-Beam
xx000D6C N-Beam NFx
xx000D6E N-Explo
xx000D70 N-Explo NFx
xx000D72 N-Wave

Or write in console: \'Help \"0 N-\" 4\'



Endorse if it like. And have fun.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
OLD: (not recommended) everything between \"{\"   \"}\" is obsolete
{
V1.2
+New working shout
+Add Other version of Naughty Explosion. Without Effects.
V1.1
+add Naughty Explosion (illusionSPELL) - Like Generic Uncensor with area and self-explosion.
+add Voice Disarm (Naughty Version) - Unequip armors and clothe from agresive targets. (I could not do to throw the equip, only weapons)(the only way to learn is by console)
v1.0
+ Uncensor Bean (illusionSPELL) - Undressing the target while you concentrate. - only for femele
+ Generic Uncensor (illusionSPELL) - Undres the target for 5 seconds
Requirements: patch 1.5 (i use that)
Location:
- The books seller is in Whiterun - The Drunken Huntsman - Elrindir
- You must buy the books and then learn the spells. Or look the tiny box close there.
---if you need the spellids:
 xx000D62 Generic Uncensor
 xx0022ef Uncensor Bean
 xx00331B Naughty Explosion
 xx0048BE Naughty Explosion NoFX
 xx0048BA Voice Disarm Naughty (learn by console: player.addshout xx0048BA) NEW!!
The new cry has 3 phases as the originals.
-First phase: dis-balanced and dis-clothe for 5 seconds.
-Second phase: dis-balanced and dis-clothe for 7 seconds.
-Phase Three: Push and then throws down the equipment.
}


Mod made by me.
author: Dimitrazzz
